bindTextureName

public static void bindTextureName(int textureName)
Binds the texture so it can be rendered. The texture is chosen with its opengl name for a direct binding. The texture has to be loaded before a binding can be done.

Parameters:
gl -
textureName -

getTexture

public static Texture getTexture(int resourceId)
returns a reference to texture if the resource id has been loaded. if there is no such ID OR the ID never has been loaded it returns null

Parameters:
resourceId -
Returns:

getTexture

public static Texture getTexture(java.lang.String str)
returns a reference to texture if the string has been loaded. if there is no such string OR the string have never has been loaded it returns null
